items.title: Classic Backpack
items.description: A stylish and functional backpack perfect for everyday use. Features multiple compartments for organization and a durable design.

items.title: Adventure Backpack
items.description: Designed for outdoor adventures, this backpack is water-resistant and includes a hydration pack. Plenty of room for all your gear.

items.title: Tech Backpack
items.description: Perfect for tech enthusiasts, this backpack has a padded laptop compartment and multiple pockets for gadgets and accessories.

items.title: School Backpack
items.description: Ideal for students, this backpack offers ample space for books, notebooks, and other school supplies. Comfortable and lightweight.

items.title: Travel Backpack
items.description: A versatile travel backpack with a spacious main compartment and secure pockets. Suitable for both short trips and long journeys.

items.title: bata shoe
items.description: Product delivery duration may vary due to product availability in stock.
